name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: This product was advertised as having a padded laptop pocket. It definitely does not. It was also advertised as being able to fit an iPad in the front. Unless you own an iPad mini, it definitely does not.Seller offered for me to send the item back at my expense for a full refund or keep it for a half refund. But they were fairly courteous.

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: Super spacious tote bag with beautiful color of blue. Well made and adjustable straps.  So much space inside this beautifully crafted tote bag that I purchased for my mom for Christmas this year. She's going to just love it as she tends to go through a ton of purses throughout the year because she is always carrying so many things in her purse which ends up breaking or falling apart on her and she wastes so much money buying herself cheap purses or bags that I finally Decided to get her a decent tote bag so she is able to adjust the straps to her liking and carry everything including the kitchen sink in this bag with her and not have to worry about anything Falling out of it or not being able to fit everything she needs inside of it....especially the amount of kleenex and eye drops and hand sanitizer she always keeps in her purses.  This will definitely be a game changer for her and I'm excited to give this one to her and see how happy she'll be when she opens it up and sees just how pretty it is and spacious! Definitely recommend this brand of tote bags to everyone and will be purchasing another one in a different color for myself and my daughter later on.  Very happy that it's also water resistant and has a magnetic clasp for security closure plus a zipper.  👍👍👍👍👍

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse

reviews: This is the best laptop bag I ever purchased. It has a lot of storage and too many pockets, so you can quickly lose your keys 😅. Overall; sturdy, good quality, and fits everything you could ask for (laptop, iPad, multiple books and notebooks, water bottle, etc).

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: 仕様変更されたのでしょうか？中が全く違っていました。ストライプの柄布ではなくさっぱりピシッとしたブラウンなのはむしろいいのですが、商品説明写真にあった仕切りが無いです。内ポケットが思ったより多いのはプラスですが、仕様変更されたなら、新しい情報に差し替えていただきたかったです。色によっては仕切りがあったのでしょうか？外観は思ったよりしっかりしていて、掲載画より可愛く見えます。PC持ち運びに使いたかったため、保護と他の荷物による傷防止に仕切りが必要だったので、その点が本当に残念でした。普段遣いにしようと思います。

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: 商品説明の写真にpcを保護出来るバンド付きの仕切りがバック中央に見えるけど、購入品にはありません。在宅時に会社からpc持ち帰り用に購入したので、かなりガッカリ表面の生地が厚めのキャンバス地なのと肩にかけての持ち運びは楽なので、とりあえず良いかと会社に置いておき、持ち運び専用にしてます。私はpcと仕事書類しか入れないので、バッグ自体の生地で使用していますが、他の物も入れてpcも入れるなら、pcを保護するケースなどに入れないとダメだと思う。

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    
As a registered nurse with a busy and demanding schedule, I've always needed a reliable bag that can accommodate both my work essentials and personal items. The Women's Laptop Tote Bag with Splice Canvas has proven to be the perfect solution for my on-the-go lifestyle. Here's why I'm giving it a five-star rating.This tote bag is deceptively roomy. It easily fits my 15.6-inch laptop, along with my nursing documents, stethoscope, and other work essentials. The interior pockets keep everything organized, making it easy to locate what I need in a hurry.The bag's lightweight construction is a relief for anyone who carries it throughout the day. Even when fully loaded, it's comfortable to carry on my shoulder without causing discomfort or strain. I prefer to carry this bag on my shoulder versus pulling a rolling bag.The canvas material is not only stylish but also durable. It's held up well to daily use, including the occasional spill or accidental bump. The bag still looks as good as the day I got it.The design is chic and professional, making it suitable for both work and personal use. The splice canvas adds a touch of uniqueness, and the bag complements my professional attire perfectly. I am also in love with the color. I ran into a few coworkers who said they have the same bag for work as well!The exterior pockets are a lifesaver for quick access to my BP cuff, pulse oximeter, tape measurers, thermometer and even my stethoscope! I appreciate that there's a designated spot for everything I need, saving me from rummaging through the bag.The zippers and hardware are robust and well-made. I haven't experienced any issues with them getting stuck or breaking, which is a common problem with some bags.Nursing can be a messy job, and spills happen. Fortunately, this tote is easy to clean with a damp cloth, so I don't have to worry about stains or spills ruining the bag's appearance.Its combination of style, durability, and functionality is a rare find. It has made my work life more organized and stylish, and I can't recommend it enough to fellow nurses or anyone in need of a versatile and dependable tote bag. It's truly a five-star addition to my daily routine.

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: El color es como en las fotos. Llegó muy rápido.Es un bolso muy práctico y a muy buen precio. Lo recomiendo!

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: I've used this bag a handfull of times since buying it. To both have all my academic stuff in and also to pack things in for going away. It holds so much! I adore the exterior pockets, they are deep and hold lots. There is some inside sectioning that is very helpful including zip pockets. I tend to put my laptop in without a protector and its so safe in there. I would recommend, the quality is great from what I've seen so far.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 September 2023

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: Perfect dimensions for personal item on flair airlines.Has a good number of pockets. Very sturdy. Well put together.Have not travelled with it yet but it looks like it will hold up well for my trip.

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: This bag is better than I expected! It’s cute in a simple way. The material is very durable and well put together. There is tons of thoughtful room inside for all the items I carry, including my water bottle!  The pockets on the outside are perfect for a cell phone and keys. It’s a great bag for teachers and also for hobbies like watercolor supplies (dry of course) and even crochet items ! I love this functional and simple bag!!

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: バッグの内側の生地は【ストライプの裏地とダブルロールハンドルレザーステッチ】ではなく、暗い色の安っぽいビニールみたいな裏地です。ノートパソコンを固定できる中仕切の写真があったから気に入って買ったのに、そんなものはありません。両側面に小さいポケットがあるだけ。いい加減すぎませんか？返品面倒臭そうなので速攻ゴミ箱行きです。みなさん買ってはいけません。

reviews: ダークグレーのバッグを買いました。インナーバッグが茶色で、ポケットが少なくPC保護用ウレタンフォームもない別の商品が届きました。ずっと色違いの別のものを会社用に使用していて、古くなったので買い替えようと思ったのですが、別物なので返品します。多分、同じ商品に複数の出品者がいて、同じページで複数商品が混在している状態です。

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: Size: I wish it was a smidge bigger however  I make it work and place my 15.6 inch laptop in it vertically but can’t zip it of course.Weight: It’s heavy duty material but doesn’t feel overly heavy on my shoulder. The straps are just wide enough to distribute the weight pretty well.Organization:  I don’t think I’ve had a bag with so many organizational compartments! Pen slots, open pockets, zipped pockets, padded compartment for computer.Quality: Very well made, high quality material. It doesn’t look flimsy or floppy when you set it down. I’m pretty rough with it and it still looks new and hides dirt well.  This bag looks it will last a long time.

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: This is my daily bag and it is incredible. There are so many pockets that keep all of my things organized. I am able to carry my laptop and my water bottle along with all of my other things.

name: Women Laptop Tote Bag for Work Lightweight Splice Canvas 15.6 Inch Handbag Purse
reviews: I love this tote. It has survived the many of things I stuff into my bag while lugging my two young kiddos around (which is saying a lot). Think 3 full water bottles, multiple snacks, my wallet, whatever toys get lost in the pockets (lots of convenient pockets), and whatever else gets shoved in there (iykyk). It also has a casual meets classy look to it. It is durable and not cheaply made. I highly recommend this bag!

reviews: I received this yesterday afternoon. I was a skeptical as I have purchased a bag in the past and it was cheaply made. This bag looks and feels sturdy and well made. Storage areas are nicely lined and a good size. I am hopeful that this bag will last a long time.
